generated.css: body,html{margin:0;padding:0;height:100vh;width:100vw;font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;background-color:#708090;overflow:hidden}.noselect{-webkit-touch-callout:none;-webkit-user-select:none;-moz-user-select:none;-ms-user-select:none;user-select:none}.card{width:4rem;height:6rem;border-radius:10px;min-width:4rem;text-align:center;color:#fff;font-size:2rem;line-height:6rem;text-shadow:0 0 3px #000;box-shadow:0 0 0 2px #fff}.card-big{transform:scale(2)}#players{margin:10px auto;display:flex}.player{display:grid;grid-template-rows:100%;grid-template-columns:auto 30px;color:#fff;border-radius:5px;padding:10px;min-width:10rem;background-color:#483d8b;margin:10px}.player .handcard-count{width:30px;height:30px;background-color:hsla(0,0%,100%,.3);line-height:30px;text-align:center;border-radius:5px}#played-cards{width:8rem;height:8rem;display:block;position:fixed;z-index:1;background-color:#ff1493;border-radius:50%;top:50%;left:50%;padding:0;margin-left:-4rem;margin-top:-4rem;box-shadow:10px 10px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.75)}#played-cards .card{display:block;position:absolute;left:50%;top:50%;margin-left:-2rem;margin-top:-3rem}.spinner-div{z-index:0;display:block;position:fixed;top:50%;left:50%;padding:0;width:8rem;height:8rem;transform:scale(1);transform-origin:center;margin:calc(-4rem - 16px) 0 0 calc(-4rem - 16px)}@keyframes a{0%{transform:scale(1)}50%{transform:scale(0)}to{transform:scale(1)}}.spinner-div.zoom{animation:a .5s ease-in-out}.spinner{border:16px solid transparent;border-top:16px solid #c834db;border-radius:50%;width:8rem;height:8rem;animation:b 2s linear infinite;transition:all .5s ease-in-out}.spinner.ccw{animation-direction:reverse}@keyframes b{0%{transform:rotate(0deg)}to{transform:rotate(1turn)}}.deck-card{background-color:#000;position:absolute;transition:all .2s ease-in-out}.deck-card:last-child:hover{box-shadow:0 0 0 3px #fff}.deck-card:after{content:"?";color:#fff;line-height:6rem;display:block;width:4rem;text-align:center;font-size:4rem}#deck{width:200px;height:300px;position:absolute;top:7rem;margin-bottom:3rem;left:20px}#selected-card-div{position:fixed;z-index:2;display:block;width:10rem;height:10rem;left:50%;margin-left:-5rem;bottom:8rem}#selected-card{margin:auto;display:block;transform:scale(0)}#selected-card.open{transform:scale(1.5)}#selected-card .play{margin:0;display:block;position:absolute;top:0;right:1rem;line-height:2.5rem;background-color:hsla(0,0%,100%,.5);width:2rem;height:2rem;border-radius:5px}#selected-card .play:hover{background-color:hsla(0,0%,100%,.7)}#handcard-wrapper{width:100vw;height:8rem;position:absolute;overflow:visible;overflow-x:auto;-webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch;bottom:0;flex:1;display:flex;background-color:brown}#handcards{padding:10px 0;margin:0 auto;width:auto;overflow:visible;display:flex;justify-content:flex-start;flex-wrap:nowrap}.handcard{position:relative;margin:0 10px;transition:all .2s ease-in-out}.handcard:hover{box-shadow:0 0 0 5px #fff}@keyframes c{0%{transform:scale(1)}to{transform:scale(0)}}.handcard.selected{animation:c .2s;animation-fill-mode:forwards;box-shadow:0 0 0 5px #fff}@media only screen and (max-width:500px){html{font-size:10px}#deck{top:9rem;margin-bottom:3rem}}
